account.username_occupied: Sorry, the username has been taken, please choose another username.
account.reset: Send email to reset / change password
account.resetcheck: You registered with us through { provider }, so there's no password needed to login.

ph.email_or_username: Please enter your email or username
ph.a_email_or_username: Please enter a registered email or username
ph.groupname: Please choose a unique group ID
ph.group_title: Please enter a title for the group
ph.group_description: Please describe your group briefly, e.g. Chinese story time at Westwood, MA

vee.password: The password must contain at least: 1 letter, 1 number and one special character (!@#$%^&*)
vee.username: The username must be contain only lowercase letters or numbers
vee.groupname: The groupname must contain only lowercase letters, numbers or hyphen

firebase.auth/email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use by another account.
firebase.auth/wrong-password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
firebase.rsvp/percat_remaining: Your rsvp failed because certain categories didn't have enought tickets left.
firebase.rsvp/total_remaining: Your rsvp failed because total limit is reached.
firebase.rsvp/required_cat: Your rsvp failed because you didn't select required categories.

group.occupied: Sorry, the group name has been taken, please choose another group name.

profile.events: Events my groups or I organized

rsvp.not_opened: The RSVP for this event opens at {time}
rsvp.closed: The RSVP for this event closed at {time}
rsvp.filled: The RSVP for this event has been filled
rsvp.login_required: This event requires login to RSVP
rsvp.already_done: You already RSVP'ed, please go to your account page to make changes.

venue.save: Save venue info for future use

storytime.emptygroup: You are not an owner or manager of any group, please create one:
storytime.step0_confirm: You'll lose your progress if you go back to select group again, Proceed?
storytime.step1_confirm: You haven't chosen a group for the event. Your event won't be listed on home page.

zoom.id_regex: Zoom Meeting ID is at least 9 digits, ignoring hyphen.
